features.name: Trance
features.desc: Rather than taking long rests, I go into a meditative trance for four hours per day.

features.name: Darkvision
features.desc: I can see in dim light within 60 feed as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

features.name: Fey Ancestry
features.desc: I have advantage on saves against being charmed, and I cannot be put to sleep using magic.

features.name: Incisive Sense
features.desc: I have advantage on Insight and Investigation ability checks.

features.name: Researcher
features.desc: When I attempt to learn or recall a piece of lore, if I don't know it, I often know where and from whom I can obtain it. Usually this is a library, university, or other learned individual. The DM might rule that it is inaccessible or does not exist.

features.name: Fey Presence
features.desc: As an action, cause all creatures in a 10' cube in front of me to make a Wisdom save against my warlock spell save DC. On failure, they are charmed or frightened until the end of my next turn.

features.name: Misty Escape
features.desc: When I take damage, use my reaction to turn invisible and teleport up to 60' to an unoccupied space I can see. Remain invisible until the start of my next turn or until I attack/cast a spell. Once per short/long rest.

features.name: Beguiling Defenses
features.desc: I am immune to being charmed. When another creature tries to charm me, I can use my reaction to make them make a wisdom saving throw against my spell save DC. If they fail, they are charmed by me for one minute or until they take damage.

features.name: Dark Delerium
features.desc: Once per rest, a target creature I can see within 60' must make a Wisdom save against my spell save DC or be plunged into an illusory realm.  It is charmed or frightened for a minute, until concentration is broken, or it takes any damage.  The creature can see and hear only itself, me, and the illusion.
